creatures.name: Flamefang
creatures.description: A fierce dragon with scales of molten lava and a temper to match.

creatures.name: Mirelurker
creatures.description: Dwells in murky waters, attacking unsuspecting travelers.

creatures.name: Wisp
creatures.description: An ethereal being that feeds on magic energy and confusion.

creatures.name: Stonehide Golem
creatures.description: A towering golem built from enchanted boulders and ancient runes.
